text: Amurra inphut chempui ka-ngei aheisuok, khawa chempui khan ama'n phungli zaat ngaikha amatorsik eii. Ama'n phungli zaat chungnga thirramol choita wai aroonsik eii, halli Akaraatkhet Pathian raangna khan thota theibomju kha theibomtui soomna khan akeiiya atousik eii. Minpkla 2:9; Isa 63:3; Jo 3:13; Chonglar 14:20
